name: RhythMazer
description:
This game cannot be played without sound!

It is my entry to the GamesPlusJam3  Gamejam that i made over a weekend.

RythMazer is a disorienting voxel based rhythm game where you have to move through 5 different mazes, while moving VERY precisely to the beat of the 3 different songs. After every time you move, the whole level rotates 90 degrees.

It may be too hard, as i haven't been able to complete the last level...

All asset were made by me, except the font.

Movement:
WASD or Arrow Keys.

Write in the comments if you can complete it, and what you time was!
